mapper.sql: self.POSITION_ID, self.POSITION_CODE, self.POSITION_NAME_CN, self.POSITION_NAME_EN, self.POSITION_DESC_CN, self.POSITION_DESC_EN, self.POSITION_IMAGE, self.CREATOR, self.CREATE_DATE, self.CORP_ID, self.FLAG, user.USER_NAME as refCreator, corp.CORP_NAME as refCorp

where self.DEL = 0 and self.POSITION_ID = #{positionId} and ( self.POSITION_CODE = #{positionCode} or self.POSITION_CODE like #{positionCode} ) and ( self.POSITION_NAME_CN = #{positionNameCn} or self.POSITION_NAME_CN like #{positionNameCn} ) and ( self.POSITION_NAME_EN = #{positionNameEn} or self.POSITION_NAME_EN like #{positionNameEn} ) and ( self.POSITION_DESC_CN = #{positionDescCn} or self.POSITION_DESC_CN like #{positionDescCn} ) and ( self.POSITION_DESC_EN = #{positionDescEn} or self.POSITION_DESC_EN like #{positionDescEn} ) and self.POSITION_IMAGE = #{positionImage} and self.CREATOR = #{creator} and self.CREATE_DATE = #{createDate} and self.CORP_ID = #{corpId} and self.FLAG = #{flag} and ( self.POSITION_CODE like CONCAT('%', #{searchContent}, '%') or self.POSITION_NAME_CN like CONCAT('%', #{searchContent}, '%') or self.POSITION_DESC_CN like CONCAT('%', #{searchContent}, '%') ) and self.CREATE_DATE >= #{startTime} and self.CREATE_DATE <= #{endTime}
mapper.select: select from sq_damage_position self left join bd_user user on self.CREATOR = user.USER_ID left join sys_corp corp on self.CORP_ID = corp.CORP_ID where self.POSITION_ID = #{positionId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and self.DEL = 0
mapper.update: update sq_damage_position set DEL = 1 where POSITION_ID = #{positionId}
mapper.insert: insert into sq_damage_position (POSITION_CODE, POSITION_NAME_CN, POSITION_NAME_EN, POSITION_DESC_CN, POSITION_DESC_EN, POSITION_IMAGE, CREATOR, CREATE_DATE, CORP_ID, FLAG) values (#{positionCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{positionNameCn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{positionNameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{positionDescCn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{positionDescEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{positionImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into sq_damage_position POSITION_CODE, POSITION_NAME_CN, POSITION_NAME_EN, POSITION_DESC_CN, POSITION_DESC_EN, POSITION_IMAGE, CREATOR, CREATE_DATE, CORP_ID, FLAG, #{positionCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{positionNameCn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{positionNameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{positionDescCn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{positionDescEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{positionImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update: update sq_damage_position POSITION_CODE = #{positionCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, POSITION_NAME_CN = #{positionNameCn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POSITION_NAME_EN = #{positionNameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POSITION_DESC_CN = #{positionDescCn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POSITION_DESC_EN = #{positionDescEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POSITION_IMAGE = #{positionImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CORP_ID = #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, where POSITION_ID = #{positionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sq_damage_position set POSITION_CODE = #{positionCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, POSITION_NAME_CN = #{positionNameCn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POSITION_NAME_EN = #{positionNameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POSITION_DESC_CN = #{positionDescCn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POSITION_DESC_EN = #{positionDescEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POSITION_IMAGE = #{positionImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CORP_ID = #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where POSITION_ID = #{positionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select from sq_damage_position self left join bd_user user on self.CREATOR = user.USER_ID left join sys_corp corp on self.CORP_ID = corp.CORP_ID order by self.CREATE_DATE DESC
select POSITION_ID as positionId, POSITION_NAME_CN as positionNameCn from sq_damage_position where DEL = 0
